title: CVD pro(multi) / Multi Market Powers
content:
This indicator allows displaying a few Market Power indicators in one window simultaneously.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Filters

NameDescription
Cumulative Trades A mode in which only cumulative transactions are used in calculations.

Filter №1

NameDescription
Enabled Determines whether to use this filter in calculations.
Minimum volume Volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum volume Volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Color Determines the color of the displayed line.
Line width Determines the width of the displayed line.
